import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from '../_service/dark-mode.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(public themeService: ThemeService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} toggleTheme(): void { this.themeService.toggleTheme(); } }
